main.name: Dhwanil Shah
main.description: I work on every part of the stack
main.bio: My experience has allowed me to develop skills in designing and implementing high-performance, scalable, reusable, and maintainable software. I have a solid understanding of OO programming languages such as Java, Python and have worked with web services, SOA, and REST APIs. Moreover, my academic background has equipped me with the ability to apply my knowledge of computer science to real-world problems.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me for any working opportunities.
